lst.name: sentence
lst.str: News of a weaker-than-expected March employment report and a minor bounce back in the dollar prompted short-covering that pushed coupon issues higher, while an easing in the Federal funds rate below six pct helped short-dated issues.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dealers said that the sharp drop in three-month bills resulted in part from recent outright bill purchases for a customer, believed to be related to heavy intervention by foreign central banks to support the dollar.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Danuta Zielonka of Wertheim Schroder Co Inc said that recent slowing in the growth of the monetary aggregates is a another factor arguing against firmer Fed policy.
